rules.title: Respectful Behaviour
rules.description: Treat all members with dignity. Avoid using offensive language or slurs.

rules.title: Non-Discrimination
rules.description: Discrimination based on race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic is strictly prohibited.

rules.title: Mindful Language Use
rules.description: Limit swearing and avoid excessive profanity.

rules.title: Adherence to Server Rules
rules.description: Ensure you're abiding by all server and Discord community guidelines.

rules.title: Spam-Free Environment
rules.description: Refrain from spamming messages, emojis, or links.

rules.title: Safe and Appropriate Content
rules.description: NSFW content, including explicit images, videos, or links, is forbidden.

rules.title: Proper Channel Usage
rules.description: Utilize channels for their intended purpose and avoid off-topic discussions.

rules.title: Avoid Spamming
rules.description: Both text spam in channels and microphone spam in voice channels are not allowed.

rules.title: Respect Staff
rules.description: Mention staff only for valid reasons. Use the ticketing system for queries or issues.

rules.title: No Advertising
rules.description:
Promotion of other FiveM servers, websites, or any external services is prohibited.
No Promotion in DMs: Promoting other RP servers through direct messages is not allowed and may result in a ban.

rules.title: Anti-Hacking Policy
rules.description: Discussions or endorsements of hacking, cheating, or exploiting are not allowed.

rules.title: Respect Privacy
rules.description: Posting personal information without explicit permission is forbidden.
